member.name: T:RateMyApp.Controls.FeedbackOverlay
member.summary: The FeedbackOverlay is a user control which can be placed on the first page in the app. The control must be the last element inside the layout grid and span all rows and columns so it is not obscured.

member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: M:RateMyApp.Controls.FeedbackOverlay.PreparePanoramaPivot(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Prepare underlaying Pivot and Panorama controls if such exist.
Pivot and Panorama capture touch gestures and remain active even when overlaid with a UserControl. When FeedbackOverlay is shown, touch events for pivot and panorama controls are disabled, and they are enabled again after FeedbackOverlay is hidden.
member.param: True to set visible, otherwise False.

member.summary: Override default assembly dependent localization for the control with another culture supported by the application and the library.

member.summary: Get application name.

member.name: T:RateMyApp.Helpers.FeedbackHelper
member.summary: This helper class controls the behaviour of the FeedbackOverlay control. When the app has been launched FirstCount times the initial prompt is shown. If the user reviews no more prompts are shown. When the app has been launched SecondCount times and not been reviewed, the prompt is shown.

member.summary: Constructor.

member.summary: Called when FeedbackLayout control is instantiated, which is supposed to happen when application's main page is instantiated.

member.summary: Call when user has reviewed.

member.summary: Reset review and feedback launch counter and review state.

member.name: P:RateMyApp.Resources.AppResources.FeedbackBody
P:RateMyApp.Resources.AppResources.FeedbackMessage1
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Sorry to hear you didn't want to rate {0}.
Tell us about your experience or suggest how we can make it even better..

member.name: P:RateMyApp.Resources.AppResources.FeedbackNo
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to no thanks.

member.name: P:RateMyApp.Resources.AppResources.FeedbackSubject
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} Customer Feedback .

member.name: P:RateMyApp.Resources.AppResources.FeedbackTitle
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Can we make it better?.

member.name: P:RateMyApp.Resources.AppResources.FeedbackYes
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to give feedback.

member.name: P:RateMyApp.Resources.AppResources.RatingMessage1
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to We'd love you to rate our app 5 stars.
Showing us some love on the store helps us to continue to work on the app and make things even better!.

member.name: P:RateMyApp.Resources.AppResources.RatingMessage2
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to You look to be getting a lot of use out of our application!
Why not give us a 5 star rating to show your appreciation?.

member.name: P:RateMyApp.Resources.AppResources.RatingNo
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to no thanks.

member.name: P:RateMyApp.Resources.AppResources.RatingTitle
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Enjoying {0}?.

member.name: P:RateMyApp.Resources.AppResources.RatingYes
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to rate 5 stars.
